comment.author: 24469639@N00
comment._content: Do we know who Frank and Annie Charlie were?

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Thanks for your question, whatsthatpicture. Medicine man Frank Charlie was a signatory to the 1954 “Buckskin Declaration of Independence” and the 1955 “Miccosukee Seminole Nation Declaration of United Nations Action.” Additional photographs can be found on Florida Memory.
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
